@UNICEFZIMBABWE @HMAMelanieR @WHO_Zimbabwe @MoHCCZim @anna_honde @UNICEF Reasons Why Not To Invest&Visit in South Africa:
1.  Racist  BBBEE laws 
2. Corruption  
3. Crime
4. Unfriendly labour legislation 
5. Land Expropriation without compensation 
6. Failing infrastructure 
7. No electricity 
8 Illegal foreigners  
9 City Name Changes(Port Elizabeth)
